app.name: parcelLab
app.short_description: Checks parcelLab order status based on order number
app.long_description: Integration with parcelLab API that allows automatic retrieval of most current oder status, based on order number. The order number can either be entered manually or configured to be automatically retrieved from a Zendesk ticket field.
app.installation_instructions: Configure the following app settings, then click Install:...
app.title: parcelLab

userId.label: parcelLab userId
userId.helpText: This is your parcelLab userId. If you're unsure what your parcelLab userId is, you can find it in the account section of the parcelLab portal.

orderNumberTicketFieldId.label: Zendesk Ticket Field ID
orderNumberTicketFieldId.helpText: (Optional field) This is the Zendesk ticket field ID, that if provided will be used by the app to automatically retrieve the order number from the Zendesk ticket and then fetch the order status. If you don't provide a value here, then you will be prompted to manually enter the order number that you would like to check. You can find the Zendesk ticket field ID for any ticket fields in the Zendesk admin overview under the manage / ticket fields section

trackingStatus.orderNumberHint: Enter the order number you would like to check
trackingStatus.error.title: Error
trackingStatus.warning.title: Warning
trackingStatus.error.fetch.message: Order number status could not be found. Please verify that order number is valid.
trackingStatus.warning.invalidOrderNumbe: Could not automatically retrieve order number from Zendesk ticket. Please ensure that the configured order number ticket field ID is valid.
